channel.title: docker命令 on 丸子有记
channel.description: Recent content in docker命令 on 丸子有记

item.title: Docker Basic Commands
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Common commands Copy 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 docker info #View local docker information docker search openresty #Search for remote image warehouse docker images #View the current system image warehouse image docker ps #View the currently running container docker pull centos #Get the remote image, the default tag is not specified, which is the latest docker container run -p 8000:80 --rm -t -i centos:latest /bin/bash #-p maps
